title: Jeff Bezos, Bill Gates & Elon Musk Doing More Than Politicians to Fight COVID-19
description: The Trump administration is failing to contain the impact of COVID-19. Billionaires such as Jeff Bezos, Bill Gates and Elon Musk are donating millions. The post Jeff Bezos, Bill Gates & Elon Musk Doing More Than Politicians to Fight COVID-19 appeared first on…
content:
• The Trump administration is failing to contain the impact of the novel coronavirus in more ways than one.
